messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many km to Golden Gate Bridge?
Could you let me know your starting location? For example, you can provide an address or latitude/longitude. Then I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I'm not sure about my current location.

No problem. To compute the distance, I just need an approximate starting point. You could share:

• A city or town name (e.g. “Oakland, CA”)  
• A street address or ZIP code  
• Your latitude/longitude if you have it  

If you’re on a smartphone, you can usually find your GPS coordinates in your maps app. Let me know whichever you can, and I’ll calculate the kilometers to the Golden Gate Bridge.
Hmm, I'm not sure where to find that info right now.

No worries. If you can’t grab your exact coordinates right now, just let me know the nearest city, town, or ZIP code you’re in. Even a neighborhood or landmark will work. From that I can estimate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I can't seem to find any location info at the moment.

I can walk you through grabbing your current GPS coordinates so I can calculate the distance. Which are you using?

  • iPhone (iOS)  
  • Android  

Let me know, and I’ll send quick step-by-step instructions for finding your latitude/longitude in your Maps app. Once you have those numbers, just paste them here and I’ll compute the km to the Golden Gate Bridge.
